item.description:
Where: Sissy K's Boston

Come meet the Wedelns or catch up with us if you're missing our company!  If you are curious in finding out what we do, we are an active four season club and we'd love to tell you more about us!  There will be several Wedeln members at this event, full of answers to your questions.

Sissy K's starts free appetizers about 4pm. Food menu available (pub fare). Cash bar. $2 Bud lights.

Guest details:
All guests must be 21+ with proper ID.

MBTA stop is State Street or Aquarium Station. 

Sissy K's; 6 Commercial St;  Boston, MA 02109 (617) 248-6511
item.how_to_find_us: We should be on your right when you first walk in. It's a step up area with tables and chairs.
item.name: Wedeln Happy Hour at Sissy K's in Boston!!
